Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
bank.Transaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Payment, Transfer
public abstract class Transaction extends Object
Abstract superclass representing a general financial transaction.

This class provides common attributes such as date, amount, and description and defines an abstract method calculate() that subclasses must implement. It also overrides toString() and equals(Object) from Object.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    amount
    The amount of money involved in the transaction.

    date
    The date of the transaction in DD.MM.YYYY format.
    protected String
    description
    A short text description of the transaction.

    • calculate

      public abstract double calculate()
      Calculates the resulting transaction value.

      Subclasses like Payment and Transfer must define how this calculation works.

      Returns:
      the calculated transaction value

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this Transaction.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing date, amount, and description

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this transaction with another object for equality.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare
      Returns:
      true if both transactions have the same date, amount, and description
